name: Scribble Skirmish!
description:
Welcome to Scribble Skirmish!

In this game, you will be fending off waves of EVIL CIRCLES that wish to end your life as a little turret-bot!

-Use WASD/ARROW KEYS to move.

-AIM with your MOUSE, and CLICK TO SHOOT!

-Use Q to use your SHIELDS (if you have any).

-Use SPACE BAR to dodge.

Have fun!

This game was made for the [Doodles Ultimate - 750 Game Jam]!

music used:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/403978941/

...maybe this is a prototype for something to come...
